sentences.en: Air Chief Marshal Jock Stirrup is the head of British forces.
sentences.cn: 空军上将乔克·斯特拉普将担任英军总指挥.

sentences.en: Alan: And put my foot in the stirrup?
sentences.cn: 艾伦: 我要把我的脚放在马镫上 吗 ?

sentences.en: Fixed railway installations. Equipment overhead electric telecommunication and signalling lines. Straight stirrup clamps for small pillars.
sentences.cn: 铁路固定设备. 通讯和信号装置架空线路用器材. 标桩用直支架(直吊环)

sentences.en: He walked up to the horse and put his foot in the stirrup.
sentences.cn: 他走到马的身边,把脚踏在马蹬上.

sentences.en: If you speak the truth, have a foot in the stirrup.
sentences.cn: 讲真话的人应该一只脚踩在马镫里.

sentences.en: Jane put one foot in the near stirrup and turned to look at the stranger.
sentences.cn: 简一只脚就近蹬上马镫，转脸看着陌生人。

sentences.en: She had to lengthen her stirrup leathers.
She tried to put her foot into the stirrup.
sentences.cn: 她试图把脚放进马镫里.

sentences.en: Stirrup joints ( congruence ) should be staggered in the last two of erect steel.
sentences.cn: 箍筋的接头 ( 弯钩叠合处 ) 应交错布置在两根架立钢筋上.

sentences.en: The stirrup leathers rubbed raw patches on his legs.
sentences.cn: 马蹬皮带把他腿上的皮肤擦伤引起疼痛.

trans.tran_en: one of the rings of metal in which someone riding a horse rests their feet
